name: Loophole (Dija Studios)
description:
48 hour made jam game made under theme "A Loop". This version has minor fixes and tweaks compared to the original entry

DON'T PRESS THE RED BUTTON!

Okay, fine. Press the red button.  See if I care. (You have to press the button)

But be warned! The world will end in 10 seconds unless you can press the kill switch on the other side of the compound!

Controls

Loophole supports Keyboard, Mouse & Keyboard, or Gamepad (Controller)

  • ESC - Quit Game
  • F4 - Toggle Fullscreen
  • PAGE UP / PAGE DOWN - change window scaling
Gamepad Controls
  • GRAB & THROW - X (face 3)
  • JUMP - A (face 1)
  • USE - UP or B (face 2)
  • MOVE - dpad or left stick
Keyboard Controls
  • GRAB & THROW - Z
  • JUMP - X
  • USE - Up
  • MOVE - Arrow Keys
Mouse & Keyboard Controls
  • GRAB & THROW - Left Click
  • JUMP - Spacebar
  • USE - W (up) or E
  • MOVE - WASD
